pic_scanner.gui.models.windows.main.blueprint.columns package

Module contents

class pic_scanner.gui.models.windows.main.blueprint.columns.FileColumn(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: FrozenPropertyClass

__init__(file_path, **kwargs)[source]

Initializes the class.

This method initializes the class by setting the building and is_built attributes to False and the layout attribute to an empty list. It also sets the auto_build attribute to the value of the auto_build argument if it is a boolean value, otherwise it sets it to False.

Parameters:

  • column_key (str) – The key for the column. This is used to identify the column in the layout. It is set to None by default, and after instantiation it is frozen and cannot be changed.

  • auto_build (bool) – A boolean value that determines whether the class should automatically build itself when instantiated. Defaults to False. This property is read-only.

Builds the column.

This method builds the column by creating the layout and column elements and setting the is_built ` attribute to `True.

Return type:

property building: bool[source]

The building attribute is a boolean value that determines whether the class is currently building itself.

Returns:

Return type:

change_image(new_path)[source]

Changes the image displayed in the column.

This method changes the image displayed in the column to the image located at the path and updates the file name display element to show the new file name.

Parameters:

new_path (Path) – The new path to the image.

Return type:

None

property changing_image: bool[source]
Return type:

bool

property column[source]

Returns the column.

The column is built from the layout, and will only have a value if the class is built; otherwise it will be None.

Returns:

The column.

property layout[source]

Returns the layout.

The layout is a list of elements that make up the layout of the class. This is used to build the column, and is set to an empty list by default.

Returns:

The layout.

Return type:

list

class pic_scanner.gui.models.windows.main.blueprint.columns.LeftColumn(file_collection, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: FrozenPropertyClass

A class that represents the left column of the main window.

Properties:

The collection of files.

The listbox displaying the file names.

The list of file names.

The button to go to the next file.

The element displaying the current file number.

prev_button (psg.Button):

The button to go to the previous file.

remove_button (psg.Button):

The button to remove the current image.

Parameters:

__init__(file_collection, **kwargs)[source]

Initializes the LeftColumn with a given FileCollection.

Parameters:

  • file_collection (FileCollection) – The collection of files.

  • **kwargs – Additional keyword arguments.

Raises:

TypeError – If the file_collection attribute is not an instance of FileCollection.
